name: Automobile Electric Vehicle Smart Phone App UI Design | Dark Mode Prototype and Componet in Progress
description:
This is an electric vehicle app UI design. I make it in Neumoprhism(Glassmorphism) look. The color palette is created inspired by the colors of Neon Light in the city.

Let's press "Like❤️" button. I will enlarge or update my design file anytime and you will see and duplicate it. No bad, right?


這款設計主要顏色靈感來源都市霓虹燈配色。新擬物化設計也是基於給用戶「真實操縱」的感覺。這個設計風格還有一個姐妹版：figma.com/community/file/991222926940073062，基於 Widget 設計，可用於鴻蒙系統。

按下“❤️”，我會隨時更新這個設計文件，也方便你隨時查看和複製，大家共同進步。


My Figma Community Page: figma.com/@bearbearwong

My Behance Page: behance.net/bearbearwong

My Website: bearbearwong.github.io
